name: stable-error
description: A TypeScript library for generating stable, consistent error IDs based on error messages

scripts.build: bun run build:types && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target browser && mv dist/esm/index.js dist/index.esm.js && rmdir dist/esm
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node && mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/index.cjs.js && rmdir dist/cjs

author: Maxime Sahroui
